mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m1.join_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS join_date, m1.id, m1.birthdate, m1.gender, m1.nickname, m1.vegan_type, m1.vegan_purpose, m1.user_no, m1.is_admin, m1.interests, it.server_file_name AS profile_image FROM Members m1 LEFT JOIN ImageTable it ON m1.user_no = it.idx AND it.category = '회원' WHERE m1.user_no = #{session.user_no} ORDER BY it.image_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(nickname) FROM Members WHERE nickname=#{param1}

SELECT it.server_file_name, m.nickname, b.content FROM Members m JOIN Board b ON m.user_no = b.user_no LEFT JOIN ImageTable it ON it.idx = b.post_id AND it.category = '피드' WHERE m.user_no = #{param1} AND b.category = '피드' GROUP BY b.post_id ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT b.post_id, b.content, m2.nickname AS nickname, m.user_no, it2.server_file_name AS profile_image, it.server_file_name AS server_file_name FROM Comments c JOIN Members m ON c.user_no = m.user_no JOIN Board b ON c.post_id = b.post_id JOIN Members m2 ON b.user_no = m2.user_no LEFT JOIN ImageTable it ON it.idx = b.post_id AND it.category = '피드' LEFT JOIN ImageTable it2 ON b.user_no = it2.idx AND it2.category = '회원' WHERE c.user_no = #{param1} AND b.category = '피드' GROUP BY c.post_id ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC

SELECT b.title, f.post_id, i.server_file_name FROM Favorite f JOIN Board b ON f.post_id = b.post_id JOIN Members m ON f.user_no = m.user_no JOIN ImageTable i ON b.post_id = i.idx WHERE m.user_no = #{param1} GROUP BY b.post_id;
